graph TD
    %% Main Components
    subgraph Main Components
        A[Hub Server\nInputs: Network Traffic\nOutputs: Processed Network Data] -->|Data Sync| B[Hub Mirror\nInputs: Processed Network Data\nOutputs: Redundant Network Data]
        C[Org Proxy + Broker Server\nInputs: Transaction Requests\nOutputs: Processed Transactions] -->|Data Sync| D[Org Proxy + Broker Mirror\nInputs: Processed Transactions\nOutputs: Redundant Transactions]
        E[Org LLM Server\nInputs: Raw Text Data\nOutputs: Language Models] -->|Data Sync| F[Org LLM Mirror\nInputs: Language Models\nOutputs: Redundant Models]
        G[Org Embed Server\nInputs: Unstructured Data\nOutputs: Data Embeddings] -->|Data Sync| H[Org Embed Mirror\nInputs: Data Embeddings\nOutputs: Redundant Embeddings]
        I[App Web Server\nInputs: User Requests\nOutputs: Web Responses] -->|Data Sync| J[App Web Mirror\nInputs: Web Responses\nOutputs: Redundant Web Responses]
        K[App Doc Server\nInputs: Document Requests\nOutputs: Generated Documents] -->|Data Sync| L[App Doc Mirror\nInputs: Generated Documents\nOutputs: Redundant Documents]
        M[App Store Server\nInputs: Application Data\nOutputs: Application Packages] -->|Data Sync| N[App Store Mirror\nInputs: Application Packages\nOutputs: Redundant Application Packages]
    end

    %% Resilience Module
    subgraph Resilience Module
        B -->|Mirror Sync| O[Resilience Mirror\nInputs: Redundant Data\nOutputs: Resilient Data Structures]
        D -->|Mirror Sync| O
        F -->|Mirror Sync| O
        H -->|Mirror Sync| O
        J -->|Mirror Sync| O
        L -->|Mirror Sync| O
        N -->|Mirror Sync| O
    end

    %% Adaptability Module
    subgraph Adaptability Module
        B -->|Adaptive Sync| P[Adaptability Mirror\nInputs: Dynamic Configurations\nOutputs: Adaptive Responses]
        D -->|Adaptive Sync| P
        F -->|Adaptive Sync| P
        H -->|Adaptive Sync| P
        J -->|Adaptive Sync| P
        L -->|Adaptive Sync| P
        N -->|Adaptive Sync| P
    end

    %% Feedback Module
    subgraph Feedback Module
        B -->|Feedback Sync| Q[Feedback Mirror\nInputs: Operational Metrics\nOutputs: Performance Feedback]
        D -->|Feedback Sync| Q
        F -->|Feedback Sync| Q
        H -->|Feedback Sync| Q
        J -->|Feedback Sync| Q
        L -->|Feedback Sync| Q
        N -->|Feedback Sync| Q
    end

    %% Core System
    subgraph Core System - Yin and Yang
        O -->|Core Sync| R[Core System - Yin and Yang\nInputs: System Data\nOutputs: Integrated System Outputs]
        P -->|Core Sync| R
        Q -->|Core Sync| R

        subgraph Cognitive Module
            R -->|Processing| S[Cognitive Module\nInputs: Data Streams\nOutputs: Processed Data]
            S -->|Data Flow| T[Data Processing\nInputs: Raw Data\nOutputs: Processed Results]
            S -->|Reasoning| U[Analytical Reasoning\nInputs: Analytical Queries\nOutputs: Analytical Insights]
            S -->|Memory Sync| V[Memory Management\nInputs: Memory Accesses\nOutputs: Memory Retrievals]
            T -->|Feedback| R
            U -->|Feedback| R
            V -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Behavioral Module
            R -->|Behavior Control| W[Behavioral Module\nInputs: Control Commands\nOutputs: Behavioral Responses]
            W -->|Motor Sync| X[Motor Functions\nInputs: Motor Commands\nOutputs: Motor Actions]
            W -->|Reflex Sync| Y[Reflex Actions\nInputs: Reflex Triggers\nOutputs: Reflex Responses]
            W -->|Voluntary Control| Z[Voluntary Actions\nInputs: Voluntary Commands\nOutputs: Voluntary Actions]
            X -->|Feedback| R
            Y -->|Feedback| R
            Z -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Adaptability Module
            R -->|Adaptive Sync| AA[Adaptability Module\nInputs: Configuration Data\nOutputs: Adapted Configurations]
            AA -->|Dynamic Config| AB[Dynamic Configuration\nInputs: System Configs\nOutputs: Configuration Updates]
            AA -->|Self-Adjust| AC[Self-Adjusting Mechanisms\nInputs: Adjustment Signals\nOutputs: Adjusted Parameters]
            AB -->|Feedback| R
            AC -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Resilience Module
            R -->|Resilience Sync| AD[Resilience Module\nInputs: Resilience Data\nOutputs: Fault-Tolerant Systems]
            AD -->|Redundancy| AE[Redundancy Management\nInputs: Backup Data\nOutputs: Redundant Storage]
            AD -->|Fault Tolerance| AF[Fault Tolerance\nInputs: Fault Signals\nOutputs: Error Handling]
            AE -->|Feedback| R
            AF -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Feedback Module
            R -->|Feedback Sync| AG[Feedback Module\nInputs: Feedback Data\nOutputs: Feedback Analysis]
            AG -->|Process Feedback| AH[Feedback Processing\nInputs: Raw Feedback\nOutputs: Processed Feedback]
            AG -->|Monitor Latency| AI[Monitoring Latency\nInputs: Latency Data\nOutputs: Latency Reports]
            AH -->|Feedback| R
            AI -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Mirror Neuron System
            %% Premotor Cortex (PMC) Module
            R -->|Action Planning| PMC[Premotor Cortex Module\nInputs: Action Plans\nOutputs: Motor Execution Plans]
            PMC -->|Motor Execution| PMC_Exec[Motor Execution\nInputs: Execution Plans\nOutputs: Executed Motor Commands]
            PMC_Exec -->|Feedback| R

            %% Inferior Parietal Lobule (IPL) Module
            R -->|Sensory Integration| IPL[Inferior Parietal Lobule Module\nInputs: Sensory Data\nOutputs: Integrated Sensory Perception]
            IPL -->|Perception of Actions| IPL_Perc[Perception of Actions\nInputs: Observed Actions\nOutputs: Perceived Actions]
            IPL_Perc -->|Feedback| R

            %% Superior Temporal Sulcus (STS) Module
            R -->|Visual Analysis| STS[Superior Temporal Sulcus Module\nInputs: Visual Input\nOutputs: Visual Analysis]
            STS -->|Body Movement Analysis| STS_Analysis[Body Movement Analysis\nInputs: Movement Data\nOutputs: Analyzed Movements]
            STS_Analysis -->|Feedback| R
        end

        subgraph Hippocampus Module
            %% Hippocampus Module
            R -->|Memory Formation| HC[Hippocampus Module\nInputs: Short-Term Data\nOutputs: Long-Term Memories]
            HC -->|Long-Term Memory| HC_LTM[Long-Term Memory\nInputs: Memory Queries\nOutputs: Retrieved Memories]
            HC -->|Spatial Memory| HC_SM[Spatial Memory\nInputs: Spatial Information\nOutputs: Spatial Context]
            HC_LTM -->|Feedback| R
            HC_SM -->|Feedback| R
        end
    end

    %% UI/UX Environment and End User
    subgraph UI/UX Environment and End User Interaction
        AM[UI/UX Environment\nInputs: User Inputs\nOutputs: User Interfaces] -->|User Data| AJ[End User\nInputs: User Actions\nOutputs: User Feedback]
        AJ -->|Feedback| AL[Provides Feedback\nInputs: User Feedback\nOutputs: Processed Feedback]
        AL -->|Update| AM

        subgraph Ephemeral End User Mirror
            AJ -->|Mirror Sync| AN[End User Mirror\nInputs: Session Data\nOutputs: Mirrored User Data]
            AN -->|Feedback| AL
            AL -->|Update| AN
        end

        %% Interaction between UI/UX Environment, End User, and Modules
        AL -->|Feedback| T
        AL -->|Feedback| U
        AL -->|Feedback| V
        AL -->|Feedback| X
        AL -->|Feedback| Y
        AL -->|Feedback| Z
        AL -->|Feedback| AB
        AL -->|Feedback| AC
        AL -->|Feedback| AE
        AL -->|Feedback| AF
        AL -->|Feedback| AH
        AL -->|Feedback| AI
    end

    %% Internal Systems Feedback
    subgraph Internal Systems Feedback
        O -->|Sync| P
        O -->|Sync| Q
        P -->|Sync| O
        P -->|Sync| Q
        Q -->|Sync| O
        Q -->|Sync| P
    end

    %% External Systems
    AL -->|Data Exchange| AK[External Systems\nInputs: External Requests\nOutputs: Exchanged Data]
    %% STDP and RLHF Integration
subgraph STDP and RLHF Integration
    Q -->|Learning| AR[STDP Module\nInputs: Training Data\nOutputs: Strengthened Synapses]
    AR -->|Algorithm| AS[LTP Algorithm\nInputs: Potentiation Signals\nOutputs: Long-Term Potentiation]
    AR -->|Algorithm| AT[LTD Algorithm\nInputs: Depression Signals\nOutputs: Long-Term Depression]
    AS -->|Feedback| Q
    AT -->|Feedback| Q
    Q -->|Reinforcement| AU[RLHF Agent\nInputs: Reinforcement Learning Data\nOutputs: Reinforced Behaviors]
    AU -->|Policy Update| AV[Policy Update\nInputs: Policy Data\nOutputs: Updated Policies]
    AV -->|Feedback| Q

    %% XOR Feedback Loop
    AL -->|Detection| AW[Feedback Detector\nInputs: Feedback Data\nOutputs: Detected Feedback]
    AW -->|Feedback Type| AX[Existent Feedback\nInputs: Detected Feedback\nOutputs: Reinforcement Signals]
    AW -->|Feedback Type| AY[Nonexistent Feedback\nInputs: Detected Feedback\nOutputs: Reinforcement Signals]
    AX -->|Reinforcement| AU
    AY -->|Reinforcement| AU
end

%% Software and Hardware Integration
subgraph Software
    SW1[Software Component 1\nInputs: Source Code\nOutputs: Compiled Code]
    SW2[Software Component 2\nInputs: Compiled Code\nOutputs: Executable Programs]
    SW3[Software Component 3\nInputs: Executable Programs\nOutputs: Application Services]
    R -->|Software Sync| SW1
    SW1 -->|Data Flow| SW2
    SW2 -->|Data Flow| SW3
    SW3 -->|Feedback| R
end

subgraph Hardware
    HW1[Hardware Component 1\nInputs: Control Signals\nOutputs: Hardware Operations]
    HW2[Hardware Component 2\nInputs: Control Signals\nOutputs: Hardware Operations]
    HW3[Hardware Component 3\nInputs: Control Signals\nOutputs: Hardware Operations]
    SW1 -->|Hardware Control| HW1
    HW1 -->|Performance Data| SW2
    SW2 -->|Hardware Control| HW2
    HW2 -->|Performance Data| SW3
    SW3 -->|Hardware Control| HW3
    HW3 -->|Performance Data| R
end
